# Introduction: Why Does Psychology Need Data Science?

"Language is the most common and reliable way for people to translate their internal thoughts and emotions into a form that others can understand. Words and language, then, are the very stuff of psychology and communication." [@tausczik_pennebaker_2010]

- enhance experimental control by matching stimuli according to semantic similarity [e.g. @gagne_etal_2005]
- examine text generated from experimental manipulations [e.g. @garcia_sikstrom_2013]
- find correlations with neural organizations in the brain [e.g. @millet_etal_2022]
